details:
adjective
- dirty and messy
= synonyms: mucky
- (of liquids) clouded as with sediment
= synonyms: murky
- (of color) discolored by impurities
= synonyms: dirty
- (of soil) soft and watery
= synonyms: soggy
verb
- make turbid
= example: make turbid
- cause to become muddy
- dirty with mud
= synonyms: muddy up
